div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die
mensis marcij anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne andirson' fande his hand
landis and gudis Souerte and caucion to Johne litstar
in the grene for xxtj merkis vsual money of
Scotland' for the barnisparte of gudis pertening to
Robert andirsone his Sone and douchtir sone of
the saide Jonhnis litstaris and for the half of ayrschip
of ale gudis that the saide Jonhne has this day
and bettir' gif the saide Ayrschip may be to be
furthtcumand' and deliuerit to the said' Robert quhen
he is cumin to lauchfull age And' Ilkan of the
said partiis has renuncit quiet'clamit and dischargit
vthiris of ale writis and documentis debatable' betuix
thame to this day but fraude and gile In presence of
Dauid' mar' balye Dauid mathesone thomas rolland'
henry rede Richerd' litstar Androw litstar and Jonhne andirson'
with vthiris diuers'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die marcij
anno quo supra

The saide day Richerd' litstar' be come dettour' be his
handis landis and gudis to Jonhne andirsone burges of
this burghe' for aucht pundis and xxtj d' vsual money
of Scotland' of the rest of j pip of wade to be pait
be michaelmes nixt to cum to the saide Jhon' his ayris executouris
assignez but ony langar delay fraude or gile et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiijo
die mensis marcij anno quo supra

the saide day the belman at commavnd' of the aldirman and balyeis
passit throw the haile tone' and warnit and chargit ale and sundrie
merchandis and vthiris of this burghe to cum to the tolbutht to se and
gif thar' consale quhar' thai wald' avnter thar' bautkin
and In quhat Schip thai wald' caus' it to cum hame

The saide day the borghe' strekit one Williame buchane
be Jonhne blak that the forland' of the saide Williamis in
the Castalgate aucht to fre the Inland' that Ellene Colly
his l modir has in coniunctfeftment is of availe and the saide
Williame was in Amerciament of the court be the moutht of Alexander
chamer of murchile forspekar of the assis'

The saide day Androw Culane yongar one that vthir ane parte and William
buchan one that wthir parte ar' oblist be the fathtis of thar' bodiis
to stand at the finale decret and ordinance of thomas Waus
William blinsele Jonhne thomsone thomas narne and Alexander prate
anent the ayrschip pertening to Alexander Symsone sone and ayr' to Dauid'
Symson' quhilkis personis ar' oblist and suorne the gret aithez to deliuer
and furthtwith this day or' the sone gang to gif thar' finale decret
tharintill

The saide day the aldirman balyeis consale and communite present
for the tyme grantit ane commission' vndir thar' Secret sele
to Alexander gray Richerd Waus Williame portar John retre
and mathow branche to borrow and outquyt thar' bautkin
and' to avnter it in erast likly and best Schip cumand' to
Abirdene

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die marcij anno quo supra

the saidez day it was ordanit be ane suorne assis' that for the
eschevin of evile and for the pece and quiet of the tone'
that nay prenteis within this burghe sale wer' nay kniff
bot to the scheringe of thar' mettis for ane yer' vndir the
payne of eschetis of the knyffis and pament of ane vnlaw

The saide day Dauid githtan lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be Androw muresone for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of iijxx crovnis in lynt and wax
tharfor the balyeis chargit philp Dunbrek officiar' to pas' and tak
ane streis fra the saide Dauid' and latt it agan to the borghe'
gif it be askit and warne him to the law day eftir pasche
as to the secund' day of process'

Curia Capitalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in
pretorio eiusdem Septimo die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini Millesimo
quadringentesimo nonagesimo terc quarto

Eodem die marioria auchneyve ancilla soror Walteri quondam
auchneyve Junioris burgensis huius burgi fecit constituit et
ordinauit Alexandrum de Camera de murchill Andream Culan seniorem
Willelmum blinsele et Willelmum futhes coniunctim et divisim suos legittimos
procuratores actores et factores in omnibus suis placitis actionibus et
querelis ad prosequendum agendum defendendum et cetera Ac cetera omniam et singula
faciend' et excercend' que ipsa facere posset promitten' de Rato
et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus terminis et clausulis
necessariis oportunis

The saide day sere mathow nicholsone chaplane of Sanct peteris
altar' of Abirdene causit philp Dunbrek officiar' pas' to the tolbutht
dur' and be oppin waring' and chargit to warne and requir' ale and sundrie
personis quhome It efferis to Cum and pay him the annuell Rentis
bigane aucht to him of ane lande wast liand' in the burghe'
of Abirdene in the gallougate one the est parte of the samyn gate
betuix the landis of vmquhile Walter pyot one the southt parte
pertening to his saide chaplanry of ale termes bigan and thai suld'
haue regres' to the said' land' In the quhilkis he was lauchfullie
possessit be the balyeis of the said' burghe' be lauchfull process'
leid' befor thame as the samyn mair' fullely proportis Nochtwithst
andinge
the said' premunicion and Warning lauchfullie precedent thar
comperit nay persone to the redeming of the said' annuellis
and pament of the samyn of the quhilkis the said' mathow
tak Instrument of me sere Jonhne Stirueling clerk
and notar public' vndir the Secret Sell of Abirdene befor thir
witnes Alexander rede aldirman thomas prat Alexander mar' Jhon'
menyeis Jhon' moir' and sere William Crukschank

The saide day comperit ane callit glenny and follouit henry
Crage for iiijor merkis of Inglis grotis quhilkis he denyit and in
continent the saide action' with batht thar consentis was put to the
decisione of ane assis' of thir personis vndir writin that is to say
Thomas prat Jonhne Colisone Androw murray eldar William futhes
Jonhne moir' Alexander nachty William Kintor James Kennarty Jonhe
grige henry hourum mark Scot Androw Watson' and Johne thomsone
quhilkis riplie avisit the gretis aithez Suorne fand' the saide henry
quhi quyt of his challance of the said' iiijor merkis and the saide
glenny in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' follouing
of the saide Al henry be Strintht of ane borghe'

Eodem die accedens ad barram thomas Waus et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et viij d' sibi annuatim debit'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter terram thome gledstan
versus occidens et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et terram ipsius thome
Waus ex australi et terram Agnetis gilespy ex boreali Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Roberto evinsone Willelmo gray scissore Willelmo cuminge et
thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Andreas murray protestatus fuit pro vno annuo
redditu sex s' et viij d' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in
vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram altaris Sancti Sthephani
ex australi ex vna et terram Andree branche ex boreali partibus ab altera
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Roberto evinsone Willelmo gray scissore et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Willelmus coupar et protestatus fuit
in forma iuris pro vno annuo redditu xiij s' et iiij d' sibi annuatim
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte
eiusdem inter communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens et le
calsay exeuntem inter terram ipsius Willelmi et Richardi hill versus
austrum ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam secundo die huius processus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Willelmus Cruk
schank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthaici infra ecclesiam
beati nicholaij de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno
annuo Redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico Superiore ecclesie inter terram thome prat
ex orientali et terram thome mar' ex australi Ad quam terram acce
dens nichil reperit distringibile preter et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus gilberto gareaiche
Alexandro horne et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram discretus vir magister
Alexander fyf Capellanus ac procurator altaris Sanctissime marie virginis
et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu duorum solidorum
sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in le
greyne ex occidentali parte aque inter terram quondam Roberti club ex australi
et terram quondam Alexandri Kintor ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Johanne greyne petro futhes et andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir ffrater Robertus
Welschot procurator et eo nomine proiris et conuentus domus fratrum predicatorum
de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
vj s' et viij d' sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico Superiore ecclesie inter terram thome prat ex orientali
et terram thome mar' ex australi Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentavit
in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Eodem die Accedens ad barram
Johanne Williamson' Andrea litstar et Johanne brogan seriando

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
decimo die mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day Jonet Kintor the relict of Jonhne Stevinsone
burges of Abirdene grantit avand' to Johne molisone sone and
ayr' to vmquhile Wilyeam molisone tua merkis of annuell
of termes bigan vnpait of the land' liand' in the gallou
gate nerrast the land' of vmquhile Alexander houysone one the
southt parte to be pait be within xv dais eftir the next Witson
day at the farrast

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xj die
Aprilis Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday
cum xv dais to Jonhne Wormet to ansuer' to the borghe'
strekit one him be Jonhne thomsone for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of xl s' of the rest of tua li' g'

The saide day thomas forbes bonatmakar was conuikit be
ane suorne assis' of thir personis vndir writin thomas prat
Jonhne Wormete Androw murray eldar thomas mar' Robert crage
James Colisone Johne grige William blinsele Johne moir' Alexander
nachty Williame Wormete Richerd' hile yongar and Alexander chamer in the
Schipraw for the occupeinge of fremynnis craft wranguislie
to Amend' as law will and forber' in tym tocum

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij die aprilis
anno quo supra

The saide day Androw Watsone grantyt him avand' to arnald'
Wanstakinburghe ix li' g' et x s' g' befor the date of certane lettres
producit be him In Jugement

the saide day Williame moir' yongar grantit him avand' to Androw
Wanstakingburghe vij s' g' of licht money

the saide day the procuratoris of the the executoris of vmquhile Arnalde
of Wanstakinburghe follouit gilbert gareauche for vj li' g' of the
quhilk he was fundin quyt

head.add: Alexander angosone Dauid strathin peter futhes

div.p:
the saide day Anton' laveris procuratouris to the executouris of vmquhile
Arnald' Wanstakinburghe follouit Alexander angosone for iiij li g' iij s'
g' Dauid strachin for ij li' g' xiij s' g' and j g' / and peter futhes for
viij Sanct Androuis guthtlingis and the aldirman and balyeis assignit
monunday that next cumis to thame to ansuer' to the saide procuratouris
that is to say gif the saide thre personis walde acquit thame be
thar' aithis that thai aw nocht the said somes or nocht
